mapper.insert: insert into animal values((select nvl(max(animal_number),0)+1 from animal),null,#{animal_name},#{animal_species},#{animal_type},#{animal_gender},#{animal_age},default,#{animal_weight},#{animal_image},default)
mapper.select: select * from animal where animal_species like '%'||#{animal_species}||'%' and animal_gender like '%'||#{animal_gender}||'%' and (animal_weight >= #{animal_weight_over} and animal_weight < #{animal_weight_under}) and (animal_age_num >= #{animal_age_more} and animal_age_num <= #{animal_age_less}) and animal_name like '%'||#{animal_name}||'%'
